title: Fig and date loaf
ingredients: ['180g chopped pitted dates', '200g chopped dried figs', '60g unsalted butter, softened', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '235ml boiling water', '100g caster sugar', '60g chopped walnuts', '2 eggs', '100g plain flour', '100g wholemeal flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
